short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the city, state, country code of the selected (highlighted) IP address in the active tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight an IP address or host and click the extension's icon in the active tab to locate the city, state, and country code of the respective host.
